phrases: Understood.
I will investigate here, too.
I will contact you again later.
Um, Rieze?
I-I am sorry...
It is nothing.
I know this is an important time.
You do not need to put up a brave front.
Would you like to tell me what happened?
Takayama's weapon went out of control?
And Crusty disappeared?
He is missing, and he is not responding to telepathy.
We also have that murderer to think about.
Until more details are known, D.D.D. does not want word to get out.
Yeah, it may be best to wait before we tell the Round Table.
There are Minami spies around, too.
We should not tell Princess Lenessia, either.
Thanks.
Knowing Crusty, he will come right back, as if nothing happened.
You are right.
Henrietta, big trouble!
What is going on?
I need to talk to you about the flavor text.
The Maidens of Watermaple
The Maidens of Watermaple.
The flavor text is becoming real?
Yeah.
Originally, it was just backstories for items.
But now, the stuff in the text is coming true or happening in reality.
Then we will also need to be mindful of the flavor text in the future.
Yeah, we do not know what will happen.
Which means Misa's weapon's going out of control
might be related to that.
And...
The murderer's Byakumaru...
Its flavor text might have become real, too.
That means the murderer possesses not only a Royal Guard's armor,
but a powerful weapon, as well.
Byakumaru is a raid drop, is not it?
Yes, it is from a raid monster in the tenth expansion pack,
the Death Warrior Rugrius.
It was his katana.
Rugrius?
What does its flavor text say?
It describes the legend of Rugrius, and how he became a monster.
He was originally one of the Izumo Knights, a hero of the Ice Wall,
Legend/ Graupel Sword Byakumaru
The favorite sword of Rugrius, the hero of Ezzo who drove the giants to the Jade Garden.
This blade freezes everything, and contains the rage of the hero who met his death at the betrayal of the Daughter of Elm, Sutu Inaw.
who fought for a century.
He fought to protect the happiness of the people of Susukino,
and he drove away the evil giants.
He was truly the Ezzo Empire's hero.
But...
He was betrayed by the Daughter of Elm,
Sutu Inaw, and poisoned to death.
So, as a raid monster, Rugrius was described as angry and hateful.
That is quite a dark story.
Then that hateful spirit has become real,
and is giving the murderer power?
That is ridiculous!
S-Sorry, I just...
If that is the case, we can use it to our advantage in our planning.
No...
No!
I am not Rugrius!
I am a proud Defender!
That is right, Nelreth.
You are not the town guard dog.
You are a chosen hero, with the power to surpass the adventurers.
Together, we shall avenge ourselves upon the Daughter of Elm
and the humans...
The flavor text is becoming real.
If I would had Byakumaru, what would have happened to me?
With that ugly jealousy I felt toward Minori...
Amenoma
Are you sure?
I think it is better to stay out of it.
His little friend will find the answer on her own.
Will it really be in the Teachings?
Thanks.
They are mere teachings, but they are the Teachings.
I believe in the strength of girls.
Okay, we are going to begin training.
Our goal is to take out the murderer.
In accordance with Rieze's plan, the raid teams will train
to learn about each other and fight effectively.
Oh, right.
She wants to know the Teachings.
Everyone teach her what you know.
Um, I do not have much to offer, but I look forward to our time together.
That sounds like you want to get married!
If Henrietta heard that, she would be freaking out!
We want to be strong, too!
Let us all do our best, Akatsuki!
Feels good to say what is on your mind, right?
Is everyone ready?
First, you need to be able to judge distance by sight.
Teachings?
I am not sure...
Anything you know would help.
Please.
It is not something you can get by clearing a raid or getting an item...
That is right.
It is nothing that special.
And it is not something you can just teach someone.
For example, our guild master's Teachings give him an ability called Eyes of the Void.
It let us him visualize a target's HP and status, even if he cannot see them.
With this ability,
I can know the HP of players behind me, so it is pretty handy.
I see!
But only the guild master can do it,
so I do not know if you can learn it.
That is fine!
Teach me anyway!
Again!
The Teachings...
If only I had more of a clue.
Akatsuki!
This is especially for you!
Especially?
You Can Do It
The murderer is a Person of the Land,
and since he was a Royal Guard, he has the movable armor's power.
And the Graupel Sword Byakumaru, as well.
With normal attacks, the Byakumaru can deal blizzard and cold damage.
Rugrius was a raid boss, right?
Yes.
Taking that into account,
with the flavor text now becoming real, it has three effects.
First, freeze status from the blizzard.
Second, all of his stats are buffed for every additional person he fights.
For every adventurer within fifty meters,
his attack and defense increase.
Then we cannot all fight him at once, huh?
So the plan is...
Instead of six-member raid teams, we will use teams of two or three.
We will deploy them around Akihabara like a net.
We will need twenty-four people.
A full raid in Akihabara, huh?
Rieze is amazing...
I would heard she was the leader of Crusty's guild's training division,
but she is explaining her strategy to these men without the slightest hesitation.
Are not those teams a little too small?
How will you coordinate them?
We will use the raid party chat for communication.
They will be distributed so that they can move in as soon as the target is found.
So, what is Byakumaru's third effect?
What I think it is?
Yes.
A huge boost to his HP.
Depending on the number of people in the zone,
his max HP will change greatly.
That is another troublesome one.
Then what is the plan?
I would like to issue a curfew confining people to their homes until New Year's.
Please have the Round Table ask the People of the Land to stay inside.
Well, we can do it, but...
Will it really work?
That is right.
If he has movable armor, he can teleport through Akihabara.
If he runs, we cannot do anything.
The key to that
is in Princess Lenessia's hands.
You want me to cut off the power to the large magic circle?
Yes.
Of course, if we shut off the magic supply,
the movable armor would cease to function.
But at the same time, it would disable the city's magic defenses,
allowing monsters to enter the city.
C-Cannot you reboot it?
You cannot just turn it back on?
All I can say is that it would take decades.
I am well aware of the risks.
If you accept, Lenessia...
Princess...
The mission might succeed.
No, I will make it succeed!
Does that mean you are asking me in my official capacity?
I believe it does.
No matter what your answer,
if it is your will as the princess, no one will blame you.
Even if you refuse, it will not affect your friendships with us.
There is nothing to worry about.
In the end, I could not say whether I would do it or not.
As their friend, I want to do it.
But as the Marquis's ambassador...
What should I do?
There is not much time left.
What should I do?
How is it coming along?
When is the operation?
New Year's Eve.
I see.
Solve the year's problems before the year ends, yes?
I want to learn the Teachings, but I still do not know anything.
Is there anything I can do?
Thank you.
I am all right.
Okay.
But I think you may be trying a bit too hard.
My lord, why not take a break?
Thanks.
But I want to do everything I can.
But you do not have to push yourself too hard.
I am not pushing myself too hard.
I can try hard because I want to.
I do not know why my lord is trying so hard.
But he is.
So I will do my best, too.
I cannot worry about my own pride if I want to defeat the murderer.
Because I am weak.
Hey, keep your distance, and go around.
Do not let those buffs wear off.
What is important is to truly know your enemy.
Know exactly what they can and what they cannot do.
I am weak.
But...
There are things you can only learn by accepting your weakness.
Being weak, losing...
These are not pointless things.
I cannot do anything on my own.
But...
Akatsuki, do you use these?
They are good for defense.
Thank you.
Here, have some strawberries, Akatsuki.
We got lots to make Christmas cakes, but we had some leftover.
Thank you.
I can become strong with everyone.
You are small...
But that is actually an advantage.
He is huge, right?
He will not be able to keep up if you dance all around him.
It makes it easy to get in his blind spots.
Let us try.
I have always been ashamed of my height.
But I never thought that weakness could also be a strength.
Know exactly what they can and cannot do!
This is it!
You are training to defeat the murderer, right?
I heard about it from Michitaka,
Seine/ Adventurer
Shironiji/ Adventurer
and decided I wanted to help.
Are you still recruiting?
Of course.
What about you, Seine?
Y-Yeah.
Nah, it is nothing...
This gives us twenty-four members.
I will ask you to take care of that other matter.
As a twenty-fifth member.
Understood.
I am so happy you came, Princess Lenessia!
Mikakage, are the rice balls ready?
Oh, right.
It is lunchtime already, huh?
It is hardly already...
If you do not hurry, you will not make it in time.
Sorry!
YOU-Um...
Please let me help with something.
Huh?
You, Princess?
Do you have the cooking skill?
Eh?
Um, I do not know...
Want to try?
I am starved.
Let us dig in.
Let us eat!
May I sit here?
Y-Yeah.
I made that.
It does not look like much, but it is good.
I am glad.
I am sorry.
I thought it was convenient for me.
What was?
When you tried to defeat the murderer that day.
It was only for a second,
but I thought that if you defeated the murderer,
I could avoid a conflict between adventurers and People of the Land.
I thought of crying to my grandfather or to Crusty.
But that would be no different from before.
I would just be avoiding responsibility, like the man from the Kunie
who told me about this.
But I am still uneasy.
I cannot make a decision.
When you said I was your friend,
it made me happy.
I do not know why you are uneasy,
but everyone is here.
I am here.
I am your friend.
Akatsuki...
Hey, we are going to get started!
Okay!
Friends...
Well?
Getting close to figuring something out?
The real Teaching is being able to say that Teachings are stupid.
Tatara?
If I would known...
I never would have sold it to him.
Of course not.
I know that.
Everyone does.
I cannot run away.
If I turn this over to someone else because I am weak,
I will be admitting that I am not only weak, but also inferior.
I could not be their friend.
Princess Lenessia...
Please let me participate, too!
You will be the twenty-sixth maiden of Watermaple.
Ringing Blade Haganemushi
Legend/ Ringing Blade Haganemushi
A legendary short sword that causes any armor it strikes to instantly rust away, earning it the name Haganemushi, or metal-eating bug.
Any blade it clashes against grows duller with each blow.
In the end, I did not learn a single Teaching.
But...
Now I have everyone with me!
Off you go.
Let us do this!
Yeah!
It is finally time.
Time to smash faces.
Just two?
I have been underestimated...
It is not enough.
Gather many subjects,
make them kneel,
and take their lives.
The Daughter of Elm...
The humans who betrayed me...
I will destroy them all!
Let us go!
At last, the raid begins.
The murderer's blade shines within the blizzard.
Akatsuki fights, thinking of the twenty-sixth maiden.
But her blade shatters, and her fate is about to be sealed.
When despair rules the town, the twenty-seventh maiden appears.
Akatsuki's Teaching is about to be unleashed.
Next time: Akihabara Raid.
Akihabara Raid
Rise up once more.
